description:
To all the women out there who love to meet new women, empower each other and share tips & tricks about “how to be an amazing powerful women” and everything that surrounds this. 

Women’s empowerment is the most important thing these days.
Women are the ones with the really great, creative and innovative ideas! Unfortunately they are almost never implemented because we hit fear, resistance, self-doubt, start to overthink and don’t take any action at all. We miss sometimes the “balls” in our live, I could say.

Now it’s our time to create! Instead of competing against each other, lets cooperate and support each other.

Just sign up for this empowering meetup!
When? Thursday 29th of May

Where? My appartement in Vorst. 
What? 

4PM-5PM:
 • I want to share to you some best practices that empower me in my life

5PM-6PM:


• I would love to talk about all your best practices to get empowered: 

o How do you go for that dream?
o Any advice on leading a healthy life full of energy?
o …… 

You see, the sky in the limit! There are no rules, no right or wrong, just spending some time together to connect and to empower each other in the daily things of life. We can discuss about relationships, spirituality , careers, health,….

6PM-7:30PM:

I want to end this meetup with a nice food sharing. I propose that you all bring a little dish, some foods that you really love, that give you the energy and vitality to nurture your body. In that way can cocreate this amazing meal and learn some amazing recipes from each other. (Don’t worry if you don’t feel like a chef cook, anything you want to bring is totally ok! & oven & fridge are at your disposal if needed)

See you next Thursday! Looking forward to meet you amazing women!
name: Let's meetup and empower each other

description:
Dear Empowered women,

I would love to invite you on tuesday evening to talk about self empowerment and to introduce you to one of the most powerful tools to empower yourself and to live deliberately!

Avatar is a personal development course to create the life you want to create

www.avatarepc.com

"The mission of avatar in the world is to catalyze the integration of belief systems.
What you think of as an impossible dream might be reasonable if you thought differently" - Harry Palmer, author of the avatar materials


Hope to see you all one tuesday!
name: Infohour about the avatar course

description:
Dear Power Women,


Weather is changing, we all have busy jobs, trying to combine this with some kind of social life and at the same have the feeling that we need to be in shape and look "perfect", exhausting don't you think?


I would like to invite you to an empowering evening to learn from each other some tips & tricks to enfold your full potential! With the support of other, and the believe in yourself, you will get there!


I would like to spend the first hour of the evening to let you discover one of the most powerful tools I was lucky enough to experience, the avatar course.In this introduction I would like to show you what this course will learn you to life a succesfull live, both on a personal as professional level. 


Sign up if you want to discover how to learn to live YOUR life, and connect with other power women!


Hope to see you all on Tuesday ;)
name: Powerful empowering Evening
